dialogue.phrase: Greetings Captain Dimitri! You seem ready to start your mission.
In order for the Ottership to take off you will have to create some fuel.
Try to create some chemical reactions using these very common elements, and see what you can come up with.
As you probably already know, Captain, Liquid Hydrogen is a very powerful fuel, which will help you to reach your first goal.
Don't use too much, as we only have so little left on Earth.
Dimitri, we have a problem.
What is it?
We are running out of time!
We are almost out of resources and we need your help.
Only you know how to survive this mission. That’s why we need you to venture into otter space.
I can’t. I have a son, a daughter and a loving wife here on earth.
They will starve if no one brings them wood and water.
Fine! I’ll go, I guess I have no otter choice.
Wait.. How do I start this ship again?
Oh sorry, I almost forgot. Make sure to select one of the types of fuel you have created.
Got it!
Wow, is that the moon?
No, it’s a giant space ball.
Really?
No.
Aahw.
Can we still collect the resources?
Fine.
There is someone at the door for you, dear...
Ugh, I don’t have time right now. Tell them I am not home.
It’s one of the Onions, dear. I don’t think I can.
Dimitri! We must speak with you. It’s very urgent!
